title: Explicit Instructional Design Project for Enhancing Historical Causal Analysis Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic historical terminology and chronological event sequencing
context.additional_context: Team-based historical event analysis projects combining smartphone apps and printed materials

learning_goals: Learners can explain secondary concepts (e.g., historical context, evidence evaluation) connecting causes and effects of historical events with 80% accuracy
Learners can write causal explanations of over 500 characters using explicit strategies (comparative analysis, multi-step reasoning)
Learners can construct explanations using specialized terminology (e.g., "necessary/contingent causes") at least three times during historical arguments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
